pullrequest.title: Add //world/light to the sdf parsing stages and proposal as a sibling of //world/model

content.raw:
Er, TBH, I think I’d stand by my prior desire: Only links / joints should have implicit frames since they’re critical to assembly and sharing state.

However, for other items \(even if physcial\), they should use _other_ frames, not define their own.

Would it be OK if we tabled this for now?
content.html:
Er, TBH, I think I’d stand by my prior desire: Only links / joints should have implicit frames since they’re critical to assembly and sharing state.

However, for other items (even if physcial), they should use other frames, not define their own.

Would it be OK if we tabled this for now?
